verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARGM-MNR: inaccurately] [V: claimed] [ARGM-TMP: numerous times] [ARG1: that military personnel had not received a pay raise in 10 years] , [ARGM-ADV: though the Pentagon has enacted raises every year for the past decade] .

President Trump on Wednesday inaccurately claimed numerous times that military personnel [V: had] not received a pay raise in 10 years , though the Pentagon has enacted raises every year for the past decade .
